name: Richard Heisch
description: I am a man of integrity and purpose ,work for the us army ,a medic ..i have always been passionate with what i do,romantic with heart so filled with love ,i am a one woman man and a man who loves to extend care to whom so ever lacks it,i work the humanitarian and i love to volunteer,i enjoy sport and some special attractions,loving,trustworthy and faithful ..maybe when you try to know then you more ..
